description: Let’s talk neutrinos Two dark matter experiments have spotted signs of neutrinos knocking into atomic nuclei in their detectors. The finding portends a future obstacle for the detectors, Emily Conover reported in “ ‘Fog’ invades dark matter experiments” (SN: 8/24/24, p. 12). These detectors scan for dark matter’s interactions with the nucleus of a xenon […]
title: Readers are curious about dark matter, plastics’ effects on pollination and Percy’s selfies

description: Editor in chief Nancy Shute discusses the science of studying democracies.
title: Taking the temperature of democracy
